column1: 128kph, back of a length, outswing outside off, he pushes from the back foot to point
short and wide, he stands up and hammers it through cover-point! That sat up and asked to be hit
beaten, 130kph, back of a length shaping away, he waves at it with no footwork and is beaten
131kph, short and wide, he cuts in the air off a thick outside edge but safely and it flies to wide third man for one
133kph, yorker outside off, he squeezes out through backward point and Gunathilaka misfields! It goes straight through him for a couple
Warner walks at him, it is slung down the leg side and called wide
fuller on off, he punches a drive towards Finch and calls yes, it comes off Finch as he tries to get out of the way but they get one
131kph, full swinging into the pads, he tucks this neatly behind square and immediately calls two
135kph, good length, on off, he defends working this to midwicket
play and miss driving on the up at a good length outswinger
cracked head high through point! He stood up with a vertical bat and smoked it through point at a catchable height but he picked the gap
beaten, 135kph, hint of shape away just passing off stump through to the keeper
thumped off the back foot through cover! Back of a length, he's punching this firmly through cover with supreme timing!
129kph, fuller inswinger, he punches with control on the front foot straight of mid off for a single
back of a length, 131kph. he's standing tall and defending firmly to mid on
130kph, good length, off stump, he's working this off the back foot to midwicket
133kph, back of a length, he punches off the back foot to cover, a misfield allows one
133kph, fuller outside off, he squeezes a square drive to point
131kph, good length, angling across, he square drives to backward point but can't find the gap
good length, nipping back, huge appeal for lbw but it's going way down leg
he charges and stays leg side, mistimes a full blooded drive to mid off
139kph, he heaves this through midwicket! It was a length ball, and he just smears it across the line, off a thick inside edge but it's timed well enough
thumped over midwicket one bounce four! Length ball in the arc, he cleared the front leg, hit this better but didn't nail it, but it still nearly went for six
fuller, on middle, he drives to Malinga at mid on and takes him on! The throw is just wide! He would have been out if it was a direct hit!
good length, outside off, he tries to drive but mistimes off the bottom edge
132kph, full and angled into leg, he clips this powerfully off the pads to deep square
picked up over midwicket! Fuller length, he just flicked this with the bottom hand from off stump over midwicket and it just lands short of a six!
over-steps! And full and wide and slashed over shirt third man! Crazy line to bowl with two men back on the leg side! And a free hit coming
129kph, length, Warner swings this into the Members! It was a gift, on a tee, hit me as far as you want David. In the slot and he smashed it over square leg
slower ball on middle, he tucks this with soft hands to midwicket, pushes for two but it's only one
132kph, short and wide, he flays a cut shot hard forward of deep point! This was hit so hard! Magnificent striking. Poor bowling though
94kph, slower ball on off, he waits and waits and then mistimes it back to the bowler
112kph, full outside off, slower ball, he backs away and square drives behind point, Gunathilaka makes a great diving stop
another yorker slower ball, he gives room, but jams a bottom edge behind square and they punch one
138kph half volley, he drives nicely but straight to cover
fuller on leg, he clips this through midwicket and pushes for two but the sweeper runs in quickly
137kph, speared into middle, he works this wide of mid on for a single
112kph, slower ball outside off, he mistimes a square drive into a gap at point for a single
77kph, short ball, he smacks a pull wide of long on and calls two, Finch drops his bat and he has to dive with his gloves only!
full and drifting down leg, he sweeps fine of short fine for a couple
play and miss trying to cut a very short ball wide of off
79kph, drifting down leg, he sweeps straight to short fine
82kph, quicker leg break on middle, he pushes this back to the bowler
short down leg, he pulls a double hit fine for four! He hit it off the sticker and then the follow through smacked it off the middle of the bat fine for four! Some luck for Warner
84kph, fuller leg break, he drives inside out to deep cover-point
slog sweep in the air, it carries a long way but bounces just short of deep backward square
leg break outside off, he gives room and cuts straight to backward point
launched inside out over cover! Wow,. He stays leg side to the tossed up leg break, opens the chest and launches it over cover
Slog sweep over midwicket! Similar length and line, he slog sweeps over deep midwicket
Finch should have been run out! He bunted this back towards mid on, Hasaranga darted across, gathered while sliding, turns and shies but misses! Finch gave up. He was miles out
slider 78kph, outside off, beats him as he tries to glide it fine
fuller outside off, he hangs back and square drives to deep point
80kph, wrong un, he's hit on the pad but it's sliding down
switch hit over short third man! Brilliant! Leg break outside off, he turned around and swept this right handed up and over short third man
tossed up on leg, he slog sweeps but miscues along the ground to deep square
slid through flatter wide of off, he gives room and cuts hard to deep point
94kph, length slower ball, he bunts this to midwicket where there is no one inside the circle, they sprint for two and get them as the man runs in. Superb running
launched over square leg! 50 for Finch in style! Fuller length on middle and he picks up the length and launches it over square leg into the stands
fuller on off, he gives room and miscues this down to long on
launched over cover for six! Incredible shot! Full outside off, he clears the front leg and checks this cover drive up and over cover and hits the rope on the full
flicked over midwicket! Celebrates his half century in style as well. A slower ball, he picked it, and flicked it over deep midwicket
low full toss, placed beautifully past cover and it races away!
down the pitch, makes it into a full toss and swings it through midwicket
uses his feet then taps into the on side, looks for the second but it's not on
gets a little too close to this one and digs it out down the ground to long-on
short delivery on leg stump, poor ball, Finch goes down on his back knee and sweeps fine of short fine leg

taken at deep midwicket and the mayhem is broken (for now, at least)! Looks to go over deep midwicket again, just gets too far underneath it this time, and had to reach a little, Mendis settles well under the catch
plays back to a shorter delivery and works to deep midwicket
over the wicket, tucked through midwicket
full at the stumps, flicked to deep midwickdt
on middle and leg, Warner can't beat the bowler on the on side
back of a length, straight, a bottom-handed shovel to deep midwicket
full at middle and leg, pushed along the ground through midwicket
brings out the reverse hit again, takes this from outside leg and finds deep point
pushed down the leg side, Warner misses the sweep and it's a wide as well
now it's Maxwell's turn to bring out the reverse sweep as he picks up a delivery full outside and sends it to deep point
that's a magnificent shot as he dances down on the line of leg stump, opens the off side, then drives inside out over extra cover
another reverse, this time it's not off the middle, comes off the bottom edge to short third man
down the pitch, heaved to long on
gets a top edge as he sweeps conventionally, loops short of deep square leg
cut to deep cover
sent through the leg side, flicked back near the rope by Gunathilaka but it appears his foot may be touching the boundary
that's HUGE as Maxwell slog-sweeps with immense power over (well over) deep midwicket and into the second tier of the stands
big full toss, and into the stands again! Pull high over deep square leg. Poor stuff from Sri Lanka
now he drives straight down the ground and finds the gap brilliantly between long-off and long-on
better length at off stump, Warner opens the face and guides to deep cover to keep the strike
full, wide outside off, a slower ball at 112kph, Warner slices to short third man
that's a mighty swing from Maxwell, a slower ball on the pads, sends it off the top edge miles over the keeper
oh dear! That's gone wrong from Malinga. A massive full toss down the leg side, slower ball goes wrong...he may have seen Maxwell starting to move around the crease
leg stump yorker at 133kph, clipped to deep square
Warner trying to get down to Malinga, ends up yorking himself when if he'd stood still it could have been a half volley
length ball, wide outside off, Warner does well to reach it and angles it wide of backward point
slower ball, length outside off, square cuts and deep cover can't get across fast enough to stop the second
starts with a full delivery which Maxwell times crisply out to deep midwicket
slower ball, full at leg stump, Warner nearly punches a catch to mid-off but is just able to hold back enough
well bowled, a wide yorker outside off, Warner jabs over the top of it
back of a length, Warner goes for the pull and gets a bottom edge into the top of his leg
oh, that's brilliant from Maxi as he plays the reverse scoop to what was almost an off-stump yorker. Outstanding
a slower ball, 111kph, dug in short outside off, flat-batted to deep cover
gets the yorker in at off stump, dug out straight down the ground and it's good hustle to make the second
full outside off, Maxwell almost swings himself off his feet as he laces this through the covers
tries to reverse sweep a 135kph delivery speared in at off stump! It scoots under his bat
full at the stumps, that is crunched again as he drives, but couldn't have picked out deep cover better
full outside leg, swinging into the boots, clipped through midwicket and they can't stop the second
what a stroke! He's played some brilliant ones, but that's as well-timed as any as he brings out the conventional cover drive and creams it along the ground to deep cover
well bowled! Gets a yorker under his bat, and it goes through his legs. Beats leg stump
aims for a repeat, it's a low full toss but costs just the single as Maxwell mistimes backward of square on the leg side
full and wide outside off, great placement again as he slices the drive through backward point...that's his T20I best
a yorker at off stump, worked into the leg side and this time they can't convert into a brace
into the crowd over midwicket as he connects with a low full toss, that takes him to a 22-ball fifty. Follows his superb series in India back in February
that's extraordinary as he brings out the helicopter shot over deep square leg, was a full delivery at the stumps, he stays deep in the crease and whips through it with vast power in the wrists
full, wide outside off, Warner slips over trying to reach it and then wonders why there's no wide call. Was just inside the marker
full toss outside off, driven to deep cover and he loses the strike
a rare dot ball as he drives straight to mid-off, tried to give himself room
I've no idea how to describe this really, but Maxwell has ended up on his backside and with a boundary as he reverse scoops a full toss down to third man. Bonkers innings
a short ball, zips through to the keeper as Maxwell tries to upper cut...they haven't tried enough short stuff
back of a length outside off, sliced over backward point to bring up the hundred stand off 51 balls and an overthrow gifts a second, which means Warner has the strike
wide outside off, called wide
wide again, throws the bat at this one and gets a thick outside edge down to third man...onto 96
loopy full toss outside off, driven to deep point and it's just the single so he loses the strike

given caught behind off an inside edge as he looks to flick away a full delivery and Maxwell has called the review. Yep, he's inside-edge this between his legs to the keeper! A very Maxwell way to get out, the end of a brilliant innings.
taps this into the leg side to give Warner the strike
full outside off, drives inside out over cover and places it well enough for the second to deep cover
he's done it! as he angles a full delivery to the off side. A wonderful 56-ball century and he takes in the ovation
146kph, back of a length, he stands tall and defends to backward point, he wants one but Mendis sends him back
144kph, shorter length outside off, he's back and opening the face to run it to third man
146kph, good length, fourth stump line, he pushes on the front foot to point
147kph, very full on off, he jams the bat down and squirts it to point

caught at square leg! 143kph, short ball got big on him as he tried to pull from low to high, he got none of it, it just ballooned up off the splice of the bat, Turner cruises from midwicket to take a comfortable catch at square leg. Just too quick
beaten by a 145kph, thunderbolt that just moved away off a length outside off
very full outside off, he pushes this on the front foot to a gap at cover, they hesitate but go eventually and sneak through
132kph, good length, angled across, he leaves
131kph, short and wide, he hammers a front foot square drive straight to a well placed man at deep backward point
134kph, back of a length, he charges and stays leg side but misses trying to flay through the off side
fuller, he drives straight to cover-point

dropped by Agar at deep backward point! A sitter. He was placed perfectly for the sliced drive that carried to him on the rope, he is looking into the sun, he got there easily, settled and just spilt it at thigh height
appeal for caught down the leg side but it's not out. it came off the thigh pad
cut beautifully through point! 147kph, short and fractionally wide and he created some room and placed this perfectly through point with supreme timing
glanced past short fine leg! Too full and straight, he glances this past short fine and it races away
147kph, full into middle and leg, he falls and he jams down squeezing this to midwicket
full on the pads, he clips this firmly but Turner makes a nice stop at midwicket
148kph, short ball, he tries to pull but misses
135kph, back of a length on off, he pushes from the crease to point
132kph, on the hip, he tucks this to short fine and Starc has to slide to high right to make the stop, they get an easy one

caught at mid off! Another miscue due to the extra pace and bounce. Back of a length outside off, he tried to give room and slap it over cover, but completely mistimes it, it is spooned to mid off and Warner takes an easy catch to his right
Bowled him! 136kph, good length, nipping back a tough maybe, he tried to drive on the up and it went straight through the gate to knock back the top of middle! Cummins on a hat-trick
full and straight, driven firmly, to mid on, they take on the fielder and sneak through for one
139kph, good length, on leg, he is taken high on the pad
good length, wide of off, he's happy to leave
136kph, short and wide, he cuts but misses. Carey and Finch go up but no one else heard anything. No review
140kph, short ball outside off, he pulls off the toe of the bat to midwicket
too short and wide of off and rightly called
flash and miss with no footwork outside off. 139kph, good length outside off and he tried to crunch it
139kph, good length outside off, he slices a drive in the air but it's safe through extra cover for a couple
120kph, slower ball, back of a length, he tries to pull but is beaten all ends up
136kph, good length, he pushes this straight of mid off, he waits and then calls yes, there's an easy one
136kph, good length edged along the ground fine of third man! Well bowled but it flies away past slip and fine of third man
139kph, fuller on leg, he clips this in the air, not with great timing but into the vacant outfield forward of square
140kph, good length, he drives and misses on the up wide of off
leading edge flies safely wide of mid off. He tried to whip to leg but it landed safe
pull shot thumped wide of mid on. Short ball and he hammers a short arm jab wide of mid on and it raced to the fence
88kph, leg break drifting down leg, it comes off pad and runs fine for a leg bye
89kph, short and wide, he gives room and cuts hard past point, the sweeper on the rope works hard to cut it off
88kph, top spinner, some width, he mistimes a cut to the gap at point
shorter wrong un, he tucks this behind square, there's a mix up but Finch's throw is wide of Zampa
pushed through on middle, he pushes from the back foot to midwicket, they push for two but it's only one
attempted slog sweep, it comes off the inside of the bat thigh, goes through the legs and fine for three leg byes. it was going well down leg
94kph, back of a length, darted into off, he gives room but mistimes a drive back to the bowler
71kph, flighted with some bounce, he's back and tucking to the square leg
shorter length, he's back and pulling to deep square
slower and shorter, he's back and punching in the air but just short of cover
arm ball darted down leg, off thigh pad, onto the back of the bat but it bounces safely behind the keeper
shorter outside off, he's back and slicing a cut shot to the finer of the two backward points
missed stumping! He charged to a wrong un trying to heave it over long on, beaten completely and Carey can't take it. The bounce did him
short on middle, he's back and working this through square leg, they run well for two
beaten by another beautiful wrong un. This spun outside off as he tried to drive
short outside off, he's back giving room to hammer a cut to deep point
slid through on off, 91kph, he's back and working this through forward square
topspinner, he's back and cutting to deep point
tossed up outside off, he tries to sweep but mistimes off the bottom edge through square leg

bowled him! Played on. The quicker one sneaks through. Brilliant arm ball, 102kph, he was deceived, went back thinking it would grip and bounce, it slid on, came off the inside edge onto pad onto off stump
tossed up outside off, he drives firmly to long off
pushed through, he tries to sweep, plays over it, it touches the back thigh on the way through to Carey and he can't glove it
shorter outside off, he cuts to deep point
drifting into leg, he clips this through square
round the wicket, back of a length outside off, played with an open face to point
that hits him on the helmet, I think, as the bouncer his through him too quickly as he goes for the pull...yep, flush on the side of the lid
through him with a ripping yorker, you won't see better than that. Over the wicket, right on target, spears under the bat
round the wicket, full at the stumps, squirts off a thick outside edge to third man
gets this one away with a bottom-handed straight drive which mid-on can't get to
short of a length, follows the batsman and cramps him, defended awkwardly to backward point
drives down to long-off
tucked away
can't get this past cover as he plays forward
comes down the pitch and is almost in trouble, an inside edge saves him from a stumping chance
played to the bowler
down the track again, not to the pitch, drives to cover...nice variation of flight and pace from Agar
full outside off, a big swing to the leg side and it flies off the outside edge to third man
back of a length, splices a cross-batted hoick and it falls short of midwicket
short outside off, left alone
connects well! A short ball outside off, Shanaka middles this one and clears deep midwicket
good comeback for the free hit, a yorker outside off, takes the toe end
swing and a miss at a full ball outside off
full outside off, goes for the drive and is beaten again
down the pitch and drives to deep cover
whips a full delivery out to deep midwicket
nearly yorks himself as he pushes into the covers
a big swing across the line and gets a thick inside edge to short fine leg
pushes a length ball to cover

superb work from Maxwell in the deep who is on the mic as he pulls off the run out...the drive just clears the ring as the bottom hand comes off the bat, Maxwell sprinted to his left at deep cover and rifles in a perfect throw to Carey
on off stump, defended
tries to heave this down the ground, gets a thick outside edge that loops to backward point...been an ugly day for Sri Lanka
a googly sneaks past the inside edge and takes the back leg
full at off stump, defended
a shorter delivery, another googly, doesn't get much timing on the pull
comes down the pitch and skews this through midwicket
a yorker at leg stump, Malinga not keen to get in line, jabbed to the leg side
crunched down the ground, stays leg-side of a full delivery and swings through the line
length ball, heaved to deep midwicket
gives himself room again, swings to leg against a full delivery, was heading for middle stump but the inside edge runs to fine leg
a sharp bouncer that follows him and flies over the head
short of a length, another fresh-air shot as he looks to swing to the leg side
drives back to the bowler
thick inside edge into the leg side
finds long-off...dances down the pitch, tries to drive inside out, just gets too much height and not quite enough distance. Agar judges it very well coming round from long-off
lofted down to long on and Agar drops another running forward! He got to it and put it down

given OUT lbw! He was sweeping. He refers it straight away. It was a wrong un, it hit the back leg as he was sweeping. There is a spike on RTS as he was sweeping and maybe a touch on hot spot. The third umpire has overturned it!
Stumped by a mile! He ran down the wicket to a looping leg break, missed it by a mile and was stumped easily. They sent it upstairs but his bat was in the air when the bails were broken
driven to deep cover
clubbed down the ground straight of mid-off
swing and a miss
a yorker outside leg from round the wicket, skewed into midwicket
over the wicket, full outside off, gives himself some room and drives to mid-off
can't quite get it straight enough, Malinga doesn't connect and the ball scoots past off stump
length outside off, moves outside leg and swings without contact
a straighter delivery and he makes good connection this time as he drives to deep point
swings a full toss to deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, slower ball at 119kph, defeats Malinga
a shorter delivery and it flies over the top edge
a slower ball outside off, pushed square into point
beats the top edge as he looks to run it down to third man
full and fast, beats Malinga between the stumps and his pads as he moves outside leg
manages to keep out a yorker despite backing away well outside leg
short of a length outside off and he launches it out to deep midwicket
this is shorter and faster, Malinga plays a ducking pull and is beaten
full and straight, clubbed through midwicket
